item.title: Classification handwritten digits with liner_classifer in python
item.description: 1.Get:import pacakges and load mnist dataset import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np import tensorflow as tf ## C:\ANACON~1\lib\site-packages\h5py\__init__.py:36: FutureWarning: Conversion of the second argument of issubdtype from `float` to `np.floating` is deprecated. In future, it will be treated as `np.float64 == np.dtype(float).type`. ## from ._conv import register_converters as _register_converters learn = tf.contrib.learn tf.logging.set_verbosity(tf.logging.ERROR) # Import the dataset 28*28=784 mnist = learn.datasets.load_dataset('mnist') ## Extracting MNIST-data\train-images-idx3-ubyte.gz ## Extracting MNIST-data\train-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz ## Extracting MNIST-data\t10k-images-idx3-ubyte.

item.title: How AI can save our humanity by Kai-Fu Lee | 李开复：人工智能将拯救人类
item.description: Kai-Fu Lee presented TED talk at Aug13 2018. US invent and China apply China 2017 18 Trillon USD transaction was made by mobile payment bigger than total China 2017 GDP ,13 Trillon.

item.title: Decision Tree model in python
item.description: import pacakges and load iris dataset from sklearn.datasets import load_iris from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split from sklearn import tree from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score iris = load_iris() print (iris.feature_names) # metadata: names of the features ## ['sepal length (cm)', 'sepal width (cm)', 'petal length (cm)', 'petal width (cm)'] print (iris.target_names) # metadata: names of the different types of flowers ## ['setosa' 'versicolor' 'virginica'] X = iris.data # features y = iris.target # labels X_train is train features and X_test is test features

item.title: KNN model in python
item.description: 1.Get:import pacakges and load iris dataset from sklearn.datasets import load_iris from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split from sklearn.neighbors import KNeighborsClassifier from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score iris = load_iris() 2.Clean X_train is train features and X_test is test features. y_train is train label and y_test is test label. with 0.3 splict, we have 70% obs(105) for training and 30% obs(45) for testing. print (iris.feature_names) # metadata: names of the features ## ['sepal length (cm)', 'sepal width (cm)', 'petal length (cm)', 'petal width (cm)'] print (iris.

item.title: 【數字‧你懂的】從蘋果iPhone看美中貿易逆差
item.description: Please advise to remove immediately if any infringement caused Apple become the first US company with market cap >1T USD after a strong 2018Q3 earning when stock price go up to $200 per share PetroChina is the first company market cap >1T USD at 2007 but it decrease to 200B until today China export $15B iphone to US in a year which contribute 5% of total US-China trade deficit $375B $1000 iphoneX manufacture cost is $350 and 5% of it contribute by China ,mainly battery and assembly Reference https://www.

item.title: 東京 | Tokyo
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) location=geocode( "Tokyo" ) m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="Tokyo") m {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[35.6894875,139.6917064,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"Tokyo",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"setView":[[35.6894875,139.6917064],5,[]],"limits":{"lat":[35.6894875,35.6894875],"lng":[139.6917064,139.6917064]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}
